snippet: Former Senator Bob Kerrey, now part of an education venture based in California, has decided to leave his post as president emeritus of the New School.
abstract: Former Nebraska Senator Bob Kerrey has resigned as president emeritus of the New School, following his appointment as executive chairman of experimental education venture the Minerva Institute for Research and Scholarship, based in San Francisco.
lead_paragraph: Former Senator Bob Kerrey, now part of an education venture based in California, has decided to leave his post as president emeritus of the New School.

headline.seo: Bob Kerrey Quits Job at New School
headline.main: Kerrey, in Reversal, Decides to Quit Job at New School
headline.print_headline: Kerrey, in Reversal, Decides To Quit Job at New School
